name: Dragapult
description: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Phantom Force
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Benched Pokémon in any way you like.
